testcase.name: Validate Credit Card Payments via a SEW CSO Pulse Front End
testcase.system-out: Given I open a browser and after I max window I navigate to SF homepage.....passed When I enter my credentials and login to the page...........................passed Then I click on the Gear icon and open the setup page.......................passed And I click on the Search and search for Frank Murray.......................passed And I click on the login button on setup user page for Frank Murray.........passed And I try fo find billing acount 1042163....................................passed And I Delete the unnecessary cookies........................................passed And I reload the page.......................................................passed And I click on CCPaument button for Frank Murray............................passed And I click on Credit Card Type and select Visa for AARON P CROSS...........passed And I enter credit card number for AARON P CROSS............................passed And I set the expiry date...................................................passed And I set the customer name.................................................passed And I set the CVV...........................................................passed And I set the Amount........................................................passed And I enter on Submit to submit the payment form............................passed And I take an screenshot of the successful payment page.....................passed
